Networking.cisco_product_description: The Cisco Secure Firewall ASA provides protection to devices within coporate networks and data centers of all sizes.
Networking.description:
The Splunk Add-on for Cisco Meraki lets you monitor network and security events in your environment. The the Splunk Add-on for Cisco Meraki can collect the following data via the Cisco Meraki REST APIs: Configuration changes Organization security events Events from devices (such as access points, cameras, switches and security appliances)

The Splunk Add-on for Cisco Meraki provides the inputs and CIM-compatible knowledge to use with other Splunk apps, such as Splunk Enterprise Security and the Splunk App for PCI Compliance.

Networking.cisco_product_description: The Cisco Secure Firewall ASA provides protection to devices within coporate networks and data centers of all sizes.
Networking.description:
This app interfaces with the Cisco Meraki cloud managed devices. The search string specified is used to match a value in the client MAC address or description field. The default dashboard URL is dashboard.meraki.com. 
The API Key is generated in your account profile. An account with read only privileges is acceptable.

Networking.cisco_product_description: Cisco has a variety of switches that belong to the Catalyst family. These are powerful devices that help organizations manage networks in the most efficient way, providing security at all layers.
Networking.description: This app supports containment actions like 'set system vlan' in addition to investigative actions like 'get config' and 'get version' on a Cisco Catalyst switch.

Security.cisco_product_description: This is a Cisco platform that combines multtiple functionalities to operate through the network, such as malware protection, application control, enviromennt automation, among others. This product will help organizations to have protection against attacks.
Security.description:
The Splunk Add-on for Cisco WSA allows a Splunk software administrator to collect access and L4TM log data from Cisco Web Security Appliances (WSA) (formerly known as IronPort AsyncOS for Web). 
You can analyze these logs directly or use them as a contextual data source to correlate with other communication and authentication data in the Splunk platform.

Security.cisco_product_description: The Cisco Secure Firewall ASA provides protection to devices within coporate networks and data centers of all sizes.
Security.description: The Splunk Add-on for Cisco ASA allows a Splunk software administrator to map Cisco ASA data to create CIM-compatible knowledge to use with other Splunk apps, such as Splunk Enterprise Security and the Splunk App for PCI Compliance.

Security.cisco_product_description: The Cisco Secure Firewall ASA provides protection to devices within coporate networks and data centers of all sizes.
Security.description: This app supports containment actions in addition to investigative actions on a Cisco ASA device

Security.cisco_product_description: In a zero-trust architecture, Cisco ISE provides high visibility into every device on the network. It collects information across the network to identify threats. Cisco ISE allows only trusted devices and users to access resources within the network.
Security.splunk_addon: Splunk Add-on for Cisco Identity Services
Security.description: The Splunk Add-on for Cisco ISE allows a Splunk software administrator to collect Cisco Identity Service Engine (ISE) syslog data.

Security.cisco_product_description: In a zero-trust architecture, Cisco ISE provides high visibility into every device on the network. It collects information across the network to identify threats. Cisco ISE allows only trusted devices and users to access resources within the network.
Security.description: This app implements investigative and containment actions on a Cisco ISE device

Security.cisco_product_description: The Cisco Secure Email Gateway allows customers to secure their email communications. It stands against ransomware, malware, phishing, spam, and more. It includes advanced protection capabilities to prevent, detect, and block these types of threats.
Security.description: The Splunk Add-on for Cisco ESA allows the Splunk software administrator to leverage Textmail, HTTP, Consolidated Event Logs, AMP, Delivery, Bounce, and Authentication logs of Cisco ESA.

Security.cisco_product_description: The Cisco Secure Email Gateway allows customers to secure their email communications. It stands against ransomware, malware, phishing, spam, and more. It includes advanced protection capabilities to prevent, detect, and block these types of threats.
Security.description: This app supports investigation on the Cisco Email Security Appliance (ESA) device

Security.cisco_product_description: This product provides protection against malicious activities by leveraging the internet’s infrastructure to enforce security through a cloud-based architecture.
Security.description: This app allows management of a domain list on the Cisco Umbrella Security platform

Security.cisco_product_description: Cisco Umbrella Investigate provides protection against threats using its unique capability to collect information such as domains, IPs, and files to identify possible attackers’ infrastructures.
Security.description: This app implements investigative actions by querying the Cisco Umbrella Investigate cloud service

Security.cisco_product_description: Cisco Threat Response helps identify malicious activities from various sources by leveraging specialized threat intelligence, which speeds up incident response once a problem is detected.
Security.description: Cisco SecureX Threat Response app for Phantom provides actions allowing users to query Cisco SecureX Threat Response for verdicts and context on observables within a Phantom instance

Security.cisco_product_description: The Cisco Secure Firewall provides protection for devices within corporate networks and data centers of all sizes.
Security.description: This app interfaces with Cisco Firepower devices to add or remove IPs or networks to a Firepower Network Group Object, which is configured with an ACL

Security.cisco_product_description: Cisco Tetration offers protection for multicloud data centers using a zero-trust policy. It helps customers identify security incidents faster; for example, it can detect vulnerabilities in any software installed on the servers.
Security.description: This app supports variety of investigative actions on Cisco Tetration Analytics

Collaboration.cisco_product_description: Cisco Webex is a solution that serves as a collaboration environment. You can use it to launch real-time video conferences or create chat groups with your colleagues.
Collaboration.splunk_addon: Cisco Webex Meetings Add-on for Splunk
Collaboration.description: Cisco WebEx Meetings Add-on for Splunk uses Cisco's WebEx Meetings XML API to fetch data and ingest it into Splunk. The Add-on supports retrieving data from multiple API endpoints for Cisco WebEx meetings.

Collaboration.cisco_product_description: Cisco Webex is a solution that serves as a collaboration environment. You can use it to launch real-time video conferences or create chat groups with your colleagues.
Collaboration.description: This app integrates with Cisco Webex to implement investigative and genric actions

Collaboration.cisco_product_description: Cisco Spark was a collaboration suite for teams to work seamlessly, offering messaging, calls, whiteboards, and other features. This product is no longer supported; Cisco Webex is the new integration.
Collaboration.description: Integrate with Cisco Spark to implement investigative actions
Collaboration.comments: This app is now deprecated. Please use the Cisco Webex App (https://splunkbase.splunk.com/app/5781/) as a replacement. Integrate with Cisco Spark to implement investigative actions

Application Performance.cisco_product_description: Cisco AppDynamics is a full-stack observability platform that helps monitor your environment to detect issues in real time using Application Performance Monitoring (APM).
Application Performance.description: The Splunk Add-on for AppDynamics enables you to easily configure data inputs to pull data from AppDynamics' REST APIs.
